points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.analysis: "Last Updated: Feb 22, 2021"

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
points.analysis: "Except where we clearly indicate otherwise, ContextLogic does not endorse any Merchant, store, Product, or Product listing."

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.analysis: "Examples of the information we collect automatically are: IP Address"

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP, qui peut être utilisée pour déterminer votre emplacement approximatif.

points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
points.analysis: "For questions or complaints regarding our data use practices or Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@contextlogic.com."

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Un mécanisme de réclamation est prévu pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel.
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: This service reserves the right to edit any content you post
points.analysis: "7.3 ContextLogic will be free to use, disclose, reproduce, modify, license, transfer and otherwise distribute, and exploit the User Submissions in any manner"

case.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de modifier tout contenu que vous publiez
case.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.

points.title: The service can delete your account without a reason upon two weeks' notice
points.analysis: "ContextLogic is also free to terminate (or suspend access to) your use of the Services or your account, for any reason in our discretion, including your breach of these Terms upon two weeks' notice. "

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans raison, moyennant un préavis de deux semaines.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
points.analysis: "Changes to the contractually agreed services and these Terms are deemed approved by you if you do not expressly object to them after receipt of the Notice of Changes. "

case.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
case.localized_title: Au lieu de vous le demander directement, ce service présumera que vous avez donné votre consentement en fonction de l'usage que vous en faites.
case.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age
points.analysis: "In order to use the Services, you must be 13 years old or older (or the age of consent set by applicable law) and be of legal age to form a binding contract (or if not, you've received your parent's or guardian's permission to use the Services and gotten your parent or guardian to agree to these Terms on your behalf). "

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service est réservé aux utilisateurs âgés de plus de 13 ans.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
points.analysis: "You are not permitted to use the Services if: [...] (c) you have previously been banned from using any of our Services, unless we have reversed that ban, in our sole discretion."

case.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs qui ont été bannis de façon permanente de ce service ne sont pas autorisés à se réinscrire sous un nouveau compte.
case.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.

points.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
points.analysis: "We respect others' intellectual property rights, and we reserve the right to delete or disable Content alleged to be infringing such intellectual property rights, and to terminate the accounts of repeat alleged infringers"

case.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
case.localized_title: Si vous faites l'objet d'une revendication de droits d'auteur, votre contenu peut être supprimé
case.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
points.analysis: "Use caution and good judgment before sharing personal information in public areas of the Services."

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.analysis: "You're free to stop using the Services at any time."

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.analysis: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, ContextLogic limits or excludes its liability for: (i) your use of the Services, including any downtime or periods of unavailability; (ii) products, information or other content provided by third parties; (iii) the use of products purchased from Merchants; or (iv) any indirect, consequential or special damages. "

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.analysis: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, ContextLogic limits or excludes its liability for: (i) your use of the Services, including any downtime or periods of unavailability; (ii) products, information or other content provided by third parties; (iii) the use of products purchased from Merchants; or (iv) any indirect, consequential or special damages. "

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
points.analysis: "ContextLogic will provide appropriate notice regarding changes to the Services or these Terms ("Notice of Changes")."

case.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
case.localized_title: Le service peut modifier ses conditions à tout moment, mais l'utilisateur recevra une notification des modifications.
case.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or 500€
points.analysis: "Except for liability for death or personal injury caused by ContextLogic, ContextLogic's liability shall not exceed the greater of (i) the aggregate amount of your purchases on the Marketplace Apps in the six (6) months preceding the event on which your claim is based; or (ii) 500 Euro."

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur ou à 500 €.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
points.analysis: "For all User Submissions, you hereby grant ContextLogic free of charge a royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, save, modify (e.g. for technical purposes, such as making sure your submission is viewable on an iPhone as well as a computer), create derivative works, perform, distribute, translate or otherwise act with respect to such User Submissions as we determine is necessary to operate, market and advertise the Services, including to present display or perform such User Submission in accordance with your preferences."

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.localized_title: Le service dispose d'une utilisation non exclusive de votre contenu
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
points.analysis: "Many items can be returned within 30 days of delivery and are eligible for a refund. Some items are treated differently. See the Exceptions section below to learn more about which items are treated differently and how. No matter the item type, if an item arrives and it is defective, damaged or wrong, it is eligible for a refund, but may need to be returned. "

case.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs ont droit à un remboursement si certains seuils ou normes ne sont pas respectés par le service.

points.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
points.analysis: "For all User Submissions, you hereby grant ContextLogic free of charge a royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, save, modify (e.g. for technical purposes, such as making sure your submission is viewable on an iPhone as well as a computer), create derivative works, perform, distribute, translate or otherwise act with respect to such User Submissions as we determine is necessary to operate, market and advertise the Services, including to present display or perform such User Submission in accordance with your preferences."

case.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account
case.localized_title: Ce service conserve une licence sur les contenus générés par les utilisateurs, même après la fermeture de leur compte.
case.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties
points.analysis: "For all User Submissions, you hereby grant ContextLogic free of charge a royalty-free, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, worldwide license to use, store, display, reproduce, save, modify (e.g. for technical purposes, such as making sure your submission is viewable on an iPhone as well as a computer), create derivative works, perform, distribute, translate or otherwise act with respect to such User Submissions as we determine is necessary to operate, market and advertise the Services, including to present display or perform such User Submission in accordance with your preferences."

case.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service peut concéder des licences sur le contenu des utilisateurs à des tiers
case.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

points.title: Users have a reduced time period (2 years) to take legal action against the service
points.analysis: Claims arising out of or related to the Services become time-barred within two (2) years provided that they do not result from injury to life, body or health and slight negligence has not been ruled out.

case.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs disposent d'un délai réduit (2 ans) pour intenter une action en justice contre le service.
case.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

points.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
points.analysis: "We respect others' intellectual property rights, and we reserve the right to delete or disable Content alleged to be infringing such intellectual property rights, and to terminate the accounts of repeat alleged infringers"

case.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
case.localized_title: Les comptes d'utilisateurs peuvent être résiliés après avoir enfreint les conditions d'utilisation de manière répétée.
case.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.

points.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
points.analysis: "11.6 If there is a dispute solely between participants on this site, or solely between users and a third party, you agree that ContextLogic is under no obligation to become involved."

case.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
case.localized_title: Ce service ne peut être tenu responsable des litiges que vous pourriez avoir avec d'autres utilisateurs
case.description: You are responsible for the interactions and the disputes that may occur with other users of the Service. In the event of a dispute, you release the Service from all claims resulting from it.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Amsterdam, Netherlands
points.analysis: "Unless one of the following exceptions applies, the exclusive place of jurisdiction for all disputes arising from this contract and your use of the Services is our registered office (Amsterdam, NL)."

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.localized_title: Le tribunal compétent est celui d'Amsterdam, aux Pays-Bas.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.analysis: "To the extent permitted by applicable law, ContextLogic limits or excludes its liability for: (i) your use of the Services, including any downtime or periods of unavailability; (ii) products, information or other content provided by third parties; (iii) the use of products purchased from Merchants; or (iv) any indirect, consequential or special damages. "

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.analysis: "Through your account "Settings" you are able to access, edit or delete information you've provided to us"

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès, la correction et/ou la suppression de vos données
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.analysis: "However, if you decline Cookies, you may not be able to take advantage of certain site features, services, or apps."

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
points.analysis: "Portability - In certain situations, you may ask us to transfer your personal data directly to you. On your request, and where feasible, we will transfer your personal information to another party that you select."

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Ce service vous permet de récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
points.analysis: "We keep your information for the time period required to complete the purposes for which it is processed or satisfy legal retention requirements. The length of time for which we retain information depends on the purposes for which we collected and use it or the requirements of applicable laws."

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Ce service peut conserver des données à caractère personnel après une demande d'effacement pour des raisons d'intérêt commercial ou d'obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.analysis: "If you do not want to receive emails from us regarding special promotions or offers, you may (1) follow the unsubscribe options at the bottom of each email; or (2) visit your account settings pages."

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.analysis: "We use analytics tools and providers to understand better how individuals and their devices interact with the Services. Google Analytics is important to our analytics"

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
points.analysis: "Examples of the information we collect automatically are: [...] Location information - general location information from your computer or mobile device or precise GPS location information from your mobile device."

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.localized_title: Ce service reçoit votre position précise grâce aux coordonnées GPS
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
points.analysis: "We may use services, like Facebook, to serve tailored ads to you about the Services, our companies or products we are developing. And these services often use Cookies."

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Traçage via des cookies de tiers à des fins publicitaires
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.analysis: "Usage Data, such as: web log data, referring and exit pages and URLs"

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
points.analysis: "We reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information that we in good faith believe is necessary to comply with law or court order; enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements; or protect the rights, property, or safety of ContextLogic, our employees, our users, or others."

case.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
case.localized_title: Le service ne répondra qu'aux demandes raisonnables du gouvernement
case.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
points.analysis: "Some specific examples of how we use information are: [...] Analyze use of the Services and personalize content, including ads and prices"

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
points.analysis: "Some specific examples of how we use information are: [...] Advertise and market the Services, including in email or other channels"

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
points.analysis: "We may gather information, including demographic and statistical information from third-parties, such as business partners, marketers, researchers, analysts."

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
points.analysis: "HOW WE USE INFORMATION"

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il entend utiliser vos données à caractère personnel
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.analysis: "We employ other companies and people to perform tasks or services on our behalf and need to share information with them so they can complete their work. For example: we may use a payment processing company to receive or deliver payments; or we may use a cloud services provider to store data."

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
points.analysis: "Our Services do not support Do Not Track requests at this time, which means that we collect information about your online activity both while you are using the Services and after you leave our Services."

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
points.analysis: "We reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information that we in good faith believe is necessary to comply with law or court order; enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements; or protect the rights, property, or safety of ContextLogic, our employees, our users, or others."

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de divulguer vos informations personnelles sans vous en informer
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons and device fingerprinting on users.
points.analysis: "Examples of the information we collect automatically are: Unique Identifiers [...] We and others may use cookies [...] or related technologies, such as web beacons, local shared objects and tracking pixels to store or collect information ("Cookies")."

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web et des empreintes digitales sur les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
points.analysis: "By using the Services you: [...] Consent to having your information transferred to our affiliates and facilities in the United States or elsewhere or to facilities of third-parties with whom we share information as described in this Privacy Policy."

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: This service tracks you on other websites
points.analysis: "We may use first-party Cookies or allow others to set and read (e.g. use) third-party Cookies to gather data, deliver content, including ads relevant to your interests, on our sites or on third party sites. "

case.title: This service tracks you on other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous suit sur d'autres sites web
case.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
points.analysis: "We may choose to buy or sell assets and may share or transfer user information (including personal information) in connection with the evaluation of and entry into such transactions. Also, if we (or our assets) are acquired, or if we go out of business, enter bankruptcy, or go through some other change of control, user information could be one of the assets transferred to or acquired by a third-party."

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
points.analysis: "We may allow advertisers, including merchants ("Advertisers"), to choose groups of users to see their listings, advertisements or promotional offers based on common features of a group of users, such as similar usage patterns or similar geographic locations. "

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
points.analysis: "Objection - In certain situations, you may have a right to object to the processing of your personal data. The reason(s) for an objection must relate to your particular circumstances, such as processing of your personal data for direct marketing purposes."

case.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez limiter la façon dont vos informations sont utilisées par des tiers et par le service
case.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.

points.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
points.analysis: "ContextLogic enables you to generate ratings and reviews, photos, videos or other content about Products and stores on the Marketplace Apps ("Feedback"). [...] We reserve the right to exclude such Feedback for any reason or no reason, without notice to you. For example, we may exclude Feedback if we determine, in our sole discretion, that any rating or review could diminish the integrity of the ratings and reviews."

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer un contenu spécifique sans raison et peut le faire sans préavis
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.analysis: "INFORMATION WE COLLECT & USE"

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
